title: [Self-directed] Application of Explicit Instruction to Enhance Causal Reasoning Skills in History Education

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding fundamental concepts and pedagogical foundations in secondary history education
context.additional_context: A process for in-service secondary teachers to acquire systematic strategies for teaching causal reasoning in history classes, enhanced by VR/simulation-based situational learning

learning_goals: Explain secondary concepts (e.g., cause, effect, context) required for analyzing historical causality using explicit teaching methods
Apply causal reasoning strategies (e.g., evidence evaluation, multidimensional analysis) in simulation/VR environments with over 80% accuracy
Write historical narratives incorporating "secondary language and causal connectors" (e.g., "due to," "in the context of") three or more times
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
